about.subtitle: About us
about.title: We are BTE Germany.
about.text: Build the Earth Germany's mission is to recreate the entire German territory on a scale of 1:1 in the computer game <1>Minecraft</1>. Minecraft is the world's best-selling video game, with over 200 billion sales, and works much like a Lego box - but with an infinite number of bricks and an infinite amount of space. Build the Earth Germany is part of the <3>Build the Earth</3> project, which is active worldwide. With over 1000 people actively involved, BTE Germany is the second largest building team internationally.
